## Summary
Set up ESLint 9.x with flat config format across the monorepo. Configure TypeScript-aware linting, Svelte plugin, and import boundary enforcement per DD-09 module rules.

## Requirements

### ESLint Configuration (`eslint.config.js`)
- ESLint 9.x with flat config format
- `@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin` + `@typescript-eslint/parser`
- `eslint-plugin-svelte` for `.svelte` files
- `eslint-plugin-import-x` for import ordering and boundaries

### Rule Categories

#### TypeScript Rules
- Strict TypeScript rules enabled
- No explicit `any` (error)
- Consistent type imports (`import type`)
- No unused variables (warning for dev, error in CI)

#### Import Rules
- Import ordering: builtin → external → internal → parent → sibling
- No circular dependencies (`import/no-cycle`)
- Enforce module boundaries: no cross-module imports of internal files (DD-09 Section 1.3)

#### Svelte Rules
- Svelte 5 runes mode support
- Accessibility lint rules (a11y)

#### General
- No console.log in production code (warn)
- Prefer const
- Consistent return types

### Module Boundary Enforcement (DD-09 Section 1.3)
```javascript
// Enforce: modules can only import from each other's index.ts
// Prevents: import from 'modules/auth/auth.service.ts' in game-engine module
```

### Scripts
- `pnpm lint` - Lint all packages via Turborepo
- `pnpm lint:fix` - Auto-fix linting issues

### IDE Integration
- `.vscode/settings.json` with ESLint extension config
- `.vscode/extensions.json` recommending ESLint + Svelte extensions

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] `pnpm lint` runs across all packages without errors
- [ ] TypeScript-aware rules catch type issues
- [ ] Svelte files are linted correctly
- [ ] Import ordering is enforced
- [ ] Module boundary violations are flagged
- [ ] `pnpm lint:fix` auto-fixes what it can
- [ ] VS Code ESLint integration works out of the box

## References
- MILESTONES.md: M0 "Code quality - ESLint"
- DD-09 Section 1.3: Module Enforcement Rules
- DD-08: Frontend Architecture (Svelte-specific linting)

## Dependencies
- M0-01: Initialize pnpm monorepo workspace
- M0-09: TypeScript strict mode configuration
